sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, Stack, IconButton } from '@mui/material';
import FacebookIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Facebook';
import TwitterIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Twitter';
import InstagramIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Instagram';

const Footer = () => (
  <Box component="footer" sx={{
    bgcolor: 'transparent',
    background: `linear-gradient(90deg, #3a5ba0cc 0%, #4ecdc4cc 100%), url('https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1464983953574-0892a716854b?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1200&q=80') center/cover no-repeat`,
    color: 'white',
    py: { xs: 4, sm: 6 },
    mt: 8,
    textAlign: 'center',
    borderTopLeftRadius: 32,
    borderTopRightRadius: 32,
    boxShadow: '0 -4px 32px 0 rgba(75,108,183,0.10)',
    position: 'relative',
    overflow: 'hidden',
  }}>
    <Box sx={{ position: 'absolute', inset: 0, zIndex: 0, background: 'rgba(58,91,160,0.68)', backdropFilter: 'blur(2.5px)' }} />
    <Box sx={{ position: 'relative', zIndex: 1 }}>
      <Typography variant="h5" sx={{ fontWeight: 700, mb: 1, letterSpacing: '0.04em' }}>
        © 2025 Kent Kütüphanesi
      </Typography>
      <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ opacity: 0.92, mb: 2 }}>
        Tüm hakları saklıdır.
      </Typography>
      <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ opacity: 0.8, mb: 2 }}>
        İletişim: info@kentkutuphanesi.com
      </Typography>
      <Stack direction="row" spacing={2} justifyContent="center" sx={{ mb: 1 }}>
        <IconButton color="inherit" href="#" sx={{ bgcolor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.08)', '&:hover': { bgcolor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.18)' } }}><FacebookIcon /></IconButton>
        <IconButton color="inherit" href="#" sx={{ bgcolor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.08)', '&:hover': { bgcolor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.18)' } }}><TwitterIcon /></IconButton>
        <IconButton color="inherit" href="#" sx={{ bgcolor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.08)', '&:hover': { bgcolor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.18)' } }}><InstagramIcon /></IconButton>
      </Stack>
    </Box>
  </Box>
);

export default Footer;
